original_text: Only wild animals will lie down there. Its old houses will be full of jackals. Ostriches will live there and wild goats will jump in it.
korean_text: 오직 들짐승들이 거기에 엎드리고 부르짖는 짐승이 그들의 가옥에 가득하며 타조가 거기에 깃들이며 들양이 거기에서 뛸 것이요

sentences.original_text: Only wild animals will lie down there.
Its old houses will be full of jackals.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 옛 집들은 승냥이로 가득 찰 것이다.

sentences.original_text: and wild goats will jump in it.
